| HistoryText             = 
Snow Leopards are mutant triplets with cat-like powers. They were raised and trained by [[Piotr Phobos (Earth-616)|Professor Phobos]] in the Super-Soldier School. When the project was canceled, Leopards have settled in [[Siberia]], among the wild animals, where they were found by [[Yi Yang (Earth-616)|Yi Yang]]. Under her leadership, they fought with [[Night Raven (Vigilante) (Earth-616)|Night Raven]] and [[Natalia Romanova (Earth-616)|Black Widow]] and Issa died.{{r|Fury / Black Widow: Death Duty Vol 1 1}}

Years later, after the [[Decimation|M-Day]] Ilya and Ioakim kept their powers and joined the [[Remont 4 (Earth-616)|Remont 6]]. Together with the team they fought with the [[Winter Guard (Earth-616)|Winter Guard]], but lost and were arrested.{{r|Hulk: Winter Guard Vol 1 1}}
